_comment: This is the DiffBundle that the artifact-version-control viewer would render for this review

summary.description: New developer guide: Webhook Setup. Covers creation, event types, payload format, signature verification, retry behavior, troubleshooting.

review_plan.summary: New developer guide for webhook setup. Primary review concerns: code sample accuracy (3 languages), API response format, and completeness of troubleshooting section.

roles.name: Engineering Reviewer
roles.desc: Checks code accuracy, API correctness, technical explanations

roles.name: PM Reviewer
roles.desc: Checks workflow coverage, user outcomes, product alignment

checks.question: Does the Python HMAC signature verification code work correctly?
checks.why: This is the primary code sample users will copy. A bug here means broken integrations.
checks.look_for: Verify hmac.new() usage, correct encoding, proper comparison with timing-safe equals

checks.question: Does the sample API response match the actual v2 API format?
checks.why: If the response format is wrong, developers will write code that breaks on the first real call.
checks.look_for: Check that secret is in credentials object (v2 format), not flat (v1 format)

checks.question: Are prerequisites clearly stated before the user starts?
checks.why: Missing prerequisites = user fails at step 1 and blames the docs.
checks.look_for: API key scope, HTTPS requirement, response time requirement all listed

checks.question: Is the webhook creation workflow complete from start to finish?
checks.why: This is the #1 task users need to accomplish. Must be airtight.
checks.look_for: Both API and UI paths documented, secret storage warning, success verification

checks.question: Is the #1 support issue (body parsing) covered in troubleshooting?
checks.why: This is the most common webhook integration failure. Missing it = support tickets.
checks.look_for: Framework-specific raw body examples for Express, Flask, Django

checks.question: Are all limits and quotas documented so users aren't surprised?
checks.why: Undocumented limits cause production incidents and angry customers.
checks.look_for: 25 webhooks per account, 256KB payload, 30s timeout, 5 retries, auto-disable threshold

renderables.content:
--- /dev/null
+++ b/docs/guides/webhooks/setup.md
@@ -0,0 +1,245 @@
+# Webhook Setup Guide
+...(full file content)...
